text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode where concept descends from _x_BillableProduct
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-SpecimenAdditiveEntity
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ContainerEntityType
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-MedicalDevice
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-VaccineEntityType

name: XBillableProduct
title: x_BillableProduct
description: **Description:**The billable codes selected for Clinical Product Invoices. Steward is Financial Management.
